name: RDKit Toolkit
description: Provides fundamental cheminformatics capabilities like molecule handling, descriptor calculation, and visualization.
author: @AI4S-community

validate_smiles.name: validate_smiles
validate_smiles.description: Checks if a SMILES string is chemically valid.

get_basic_properties.name: get_basic_properties
get_basic_properties.description: Calculates basic molecular properties (MW, LogP, TPSA, HBD, HBA) for a given SMILES.

generate_fingerprint.name: generate_fingerprint
generate_fingerprint.description: Generates a Morgan fingerprint for a molecule.

substructure_search.name: substructure_search
substructure_search.description: Performs a substructure search to see if a molecule contains a given pattern (SMARTS).

draw_molecule_svg.name: draw_molecule_svg
draw_molecule_svg.description: Generates a 2D SVG image of a molecule from its SMILES string.
